card.name: 'Mech Rotation
card.property: Scrap 'Mech Rotation when it is revealed. For every 2 construction counters above the cost of 'Mech Rotation, repair all damage to one 'Mech.

card.name: 'Mech Trap
card.property:
Scrap 'Mech Trap when it is revealed. You may activate 'Mech Trap only when opponent attacks. Deplete all attacking 'Mechs at the end of the mission.
<i>Put legs on a tank and you're just asking to get tripped up.</i>

card.name: Access to Extra Munitions
card.property:
Draw a card when you activate Access to Extra Munitions. Play Access to Extra Munitions only on a 'Mech. That 'Mech does not deplete when using Alpha Strike. You may deploy this card revealed to gain an additional deployment this turn.
<i>If you're using an AC/20, you only need to hit the target once. If the target's still standing, you oughta be somewhere else anyway.</i>

card.name: Albatross ALB-3U
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack <i>The Free Worlds League 'Mech is deployed exclusively by the Knights of the Inner Sphere</i>

card.name: Aletha Kabrinski
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative, +1 attack If Aletha Kabrinski pilots a Moderate or Fast 'Mech, prevent up to 3 damage to that 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission. <i>Her 'Mech has an uncanny ability to run between bullets.</i> • saKhan

card.name: Ammo Truck
card.property:
If Ammo Truck is untapped, Alpha Strikes do not deplete your blocking 'Mechs.
{T}: Reload a depleted 'Mech. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission. You may deploy Ammo Truck revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Anastasius Focht
card.property: {T}, {R}: Untap an Inner Sphere 'Mech and tap a Clan 'Mech. {T}, {R}: Untap a Clan 'Mech and tap an Inner Sphere 'Mech. Use these abilities only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission. • Precentor Martial

card.name: Anvil (ANV-3M)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) <i>Originaly named the <i>Stingray</i> this 'Mech's name was changed following its successful performance in battle alongsinde the Hammer</i>

card.name: Apollo (APL-1M)
card.property:
Missile 2
<i>This 'Mech carries more LRMs than any other 55-ton BattleMech</i>

card.name: Artillery Bombardment
card.property: {T}: Deal 1 structure damage to each attacking 'Mech or each blocking 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Assault 'Mech Specialists
card.property: {T}: Put two construction counters on a 'Mech of 80 tons or more under construction. Show that 'Mech to all players. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.

card.name: Assault on the Rear Echelon
card.property:
Scrap Assault on the Rear Echelon when it is revealed. Until the end of the turn, any patrolling 'Mechs that block are depleted at the end of the mission.
<i><kkhht>ust reached the end of<kkhht>patrol loop an<khht>did you say, Command? Repea<kkkkkkkhhhhht></i>

card.name: Baboon (Howler)
card.property:
Missile 1
<i>This ungainly second-line 'Mech is rarely seen outside of Jade Falcon Provisional Garrison Clusters.</i>

card.name: Batchall
card.property:
Play only when blocking and only if opponent controls at least one Clan card.
+2 initiative
Your opponent cannot deal damage with more attacking 'Mechs than the number of blocking 'Mechs. 'Mechs that do not deal damage for this reason do not receive damage.

card.name: Behemoth (Stone Rhino)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) If Behemoth attacks and is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target. <i>Originally known as Amaris' Folly, the current incarnation is a devastating blend of durability and firepower.</i>

card.name: Berserker (BRZ-A3)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes Berserker deals -1 damage.) ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) Berserker deals +2 damage to an engaged 'Mech that is the same speed or slower.

card.name: Booty Cache
ComStar Investment
card.property:
At the beginning of each of your turns, put an investment counter on ComStar Investment. {T}: Gain {R} for each investment counter on ComStar Investment. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.
<i>Your investment will bring you both dividends and enlightenment.</i>

card.name: ComStar News Bureau
ComStar Support
ComStar Technicians
card.property:
{T}{R}{R}: Put one communiqué counter on ComStar Technicians. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. Remove a communiqué counter from ComStar Technicians to prevent 1 damage to a site. Use this ability only during a mission.
<i>A pint of sweat will save a gallon of blood.<i>|</i>The Word of Blake</i>

card.name: Com Guard Response Team
card.property: The target gets +4 attack. <i>Com Guard response time is never better than when one of their precious hyperpulse generator stations is in danger.</i>

card.name: Contract with 21st Centauri Lancers
card.property: {T}: Choose one of your 'Mechs. Reduce the armor of each opposing 'Mech to 0. Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap this card. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (1+2P); otherwise, you tap this card and your opponent gains control of it.

card.name: Contract with Eridani Light Horse
card.property: {T}: One of your 'Mechs gets +2 attack and +2 armor. If that 'Mech damages a card under construction, scrap that card. Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap this card. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (1+2P); otherwise, you tap this card and your opponent gains control of it.

card.name: Contract with Northwind Highlanders
card.property:
{T}: One of your 'Mechs gets +2 attack and +3 armor. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap this card. Use this ability only during a mission. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (1+2P); otherwise, you tap this card and your opponent gains control of it.
If Contract with Northwind Highlanders goes into your Scrapheap from play, restock it instead.

card.name: Contract with Snord's Irregulars
card.property: {T}: Choose one of your 'Mechs. That 'Mech gets +2 attack and +3 armor. If that 'Mech is scrapped during this mission, put it on top of your Stockpile. Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap this card. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (1+2P); otherwise, you tap this card and your opponent gains control of it.

card.name: Contract with The Black Thorns
card.property:
{T}: Roll a die. 1-6: One of your 'Mechs gets +(1-6) attack.
Roll a second die.
1-6: That 'Mech gets +(1-6) armor.
Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap this card. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (1+2P); otherwise, you tap this card and your opponent gains control of it.

card.name: Corvis
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>This early version of the <i>Stormcrow</i> was deemed too slow for front-line fighting.</i>

card.name: Dart (DRT-3S)
Difficult Terrain
Disguised Coordinates
card.property:
Scrap Disguised Coordinates when it is revealed.
You may activate Disguised Coordinates only when opponent attacks.
Until the end of the turn, you may redirect any attack to any site you control other than the Scrapheap.

card.name: Disrupted Supply Lines
card.property:
Play only during battle.
At the end of this battle, deplete all opposing 'Mechs with Alpha Strike.

card.name: Dr. Ariel Reed
card.property: {T}: Take any unique Command card from your Scrapheap and put it in your hand. Use this ability only during your Draw phase.

card.name: Expert Negotiating Team
card.property:
{T}: Untap a Mercenary card. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission.
<i>The key to negotiating with mercs is convincing them that the compromise they agreed on is no compromise at all.</i>

card.name: First Circuit Summons
card.property: {T}: Search your Stockpile and choose a ComStar card. Put that card in your hand. Shuffle your Stockpile afterward. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.

card.name: Grand Titan (T-IT-N10M)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat 5: +3 attack Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Grand Titan</i> deals -1 damage.)

card.name: Grim Reaper (GRM-R-PR29)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat: +1 attack Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Grim Reaper</i> deals -1 damage.)

card.name: Gunslinger (GUN-1ERD)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) If Gunslinger attacks and is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.

card.name: Hellhound (Conjurer)
Hercules (HRC-LS-9000)
card.property: Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Hercules</i> deals -1 damage.) If Hercules attacks and is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to the target.

card.name: Hermes II (HER-5S)
card.property: <i>This superior upgrade is slated for House Marik's elite First Guards.</i>

card.name: Hidden Reserves
High-Profile Target
card.property:
Scrap High-Profile Target when it is revealed.
You may activate High-Profile Target when opponent attacks one of your 'Mechs.
Your 'Mechs may block this mission regardless of their speed.

card.name: Hohiro Kurita
card.property: Pilot: +2 initiative, +1 attack 'Mechs that engage in battle with 'Mech piloted by Hohiro Kurita do not untap as long as Hohiro pilots that 'Mech and remains tapped. You may choose to not untap 'Mech piloted by Hohiro Kurita during your untap phase. <i>The DCMS commander's incompetence gave the Clans the change to take Teniente in days. Hohiro stayed on Teniente, and the Clans still hadn't taken the planet four months later.</i> • Heir-Designate

card.name: Huron Warrior (HUR-W0-R4L)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack

card.name: Hyperpulse Generator
card.property: {T}: Choose a card in opponent's Under Construction region. He or she shows you that card. You may transfer one counter from that card to another card in that region. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. Logistics (If you have Logistics in play, you may restock a card from your hand at the end of your turn.)

card.name: Intimidating Paint Job
card.property: Play Intimidating Paint Job only on a 'Mech of 80 tons or more. All 'Mechs engaged in battle with that 'Mech get -1 attack.

card.name: Jackal (JA-KL-1532)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Jackal</i> deals -1 damage.) <i>This was the first 'Mech produced by the now famous Vining Engineering and Salvage Team (VEST).</i>

card.name: Kraken (Bane)
Last Stand at Hanover
card.property:
Scrap a 'Mech you control and roll a die: 1: No effect. 2-6: Attacking 'Mechs do not deal damage.
<i>The skies were crimson and my eyes bled fire, that night on Hanover. I saw the cities scream. I saw my <i>sho-sa</i> die. I carried my daughter for nine months, I carry my hate forever.<i>|</i>Genshu<i> Taeko Mifune, </i>Wisdom of the Dragon</i>

card.name: Linebacker B
Linebacker Prime
card.property:
Overheat 1: +1 attack
If Linebacker Prime attacks and is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.

card.name: Mandrill
Maskirovka Headquarters
Mercenary Commission Contacts
card.property: {T}: Search your Stockpile for a Mercenary card, show that card to all players, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your Stockpile afterwards. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.

card.name: Mercenary Contract
Mercenary Relations Division
Myndo Waterly
card.property: {T}: Restock one of your Resource cads in play and choose an opponent. Tap all of his or her cards that provide {P}. During his or her next turn, those cards cannot untap. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. • Primus of ComStar

card.name: Naga Prime
Nekekami Sabotage
card.property:
Scrap Nekekami Sabotage when it is revealed unless you activate it during your Deploy phase. {T}: Deal 5 damage to a card under construction. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission.
<i>The<i> Oyabun </i>is sorry to hear about your loss. Perhaps next time you will consider his offer more favorably.</i>

card.name: Nightsky (NGS-4S)
card.property: Overheat 3: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Nightsky deals +1 damage to a 'Mech that is the same speed or slower.

card.name: Omi Kurita
card.property: {T}: Put a Resource card or Kurita card you own on top of your Stockpile. Use this ability only during a mission. • Keeper of the Family Honor

card.name: Outreach Mercenary Training
card.property: {T}: {R} Tactics (If you have Tactics in play, add +1 to your initiative.)

card.name: Penetrator (PTR-4D)
card.property: Overheat 4: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Penetrator</i> deals -1 damage.) <i>Six medium pulse lasers provide this 'Mech with massive short-range firepower.</i>

card.name: Phantom C
card.property: If <i>Phantom C</i> is fully constructed when you reveal it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Phantom D
card.property: If <i>Phantom D</i> is fully constructed when you reveal it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Phantom Prime
card.property: ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) If <i>Phantom</i> Prime is fully constructed when you reveal it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Pouncer C
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>The <i>Pouncer C</i> configuration provides an interesting marriage of energy and AC weaponry.</i>

card.name: Pouncer Prime
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) If <i>Pouncer Prime</i> attacks and is blocked, it may deal up to 2 of its damage to the target.

card.name: Protection Racket
card.property:
Choose an opponent. For each Unique card he or she controls, opponent either pays (1+2P) during his or her Repair/Reload phase or scraps that card.
<i>Sometimes you've got to pay through the nose to cover your butt.</i>

card.name: Rapid Deployment
card.property: Scrap Rapid Deployment when it is revealed. Until the end of the turn, you may pay {R} as often as you wish and gain an additional deployment each time.

card.name: Reactor Breach
card.property:
Scrap one of your 'Mechs. Roll a die for each engaged 'Mech:
1-2: No effect.
3-6: Deal an amount of damage to that 'Mech equal to the tonnage divided by ten (rounded up) of the scrapped 'Mech.
<i>Sometimes a critical hit is exactly what you'' don't'' want.</i>

card.name: Redjack Ryan
card.property: {T}: Untap a Resource card an opponent controls and gain control of it until the end of the turn. Use this ability only during your Repair/Reload phase. • King of the Butte Hold

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.property: All 'Mechs of 80 tons or more get +2 attack and +2 armor. 'Mechs that have already dealt damage assign this extra damage after this card is played.

card.name: Repair Facility
Rhonda's Highlander (HGN-732)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat 1: +2 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) 'Mechs engaged in battle with Rhonda's <i>Highlander</i> get -1 attack.

card.name: Rhonda Snord
card.property: Pilot: +3 initiative, +1 attack Choose one of the following options: Missile, Overheat, Alpha Strike, or Jump. All opposing 'Mechs either use this option or cannot use it (your choice). Use this ability only when this 'Mech blocks or is blocked. <i>Of course she's good. She copied me.|Natasha Kerensky</i> '''• Commander, Snord's Irregulars'''

card.name: Salamander (PPR-5S)
card.property:
Missile 4
<i>A devastating load of LRMs gives this |'Mech an odd, bulging appearance.</i>

card.name: Sandhurst Royal Military Academy
card.property:
{T}: Choose one of your unpiloted 'Mechs. That 'Mech gets either +2 attack or +2 armor (your choice). If that 'Mech is scrapped during this mission, scrap Sandhurst Royal Military Academy; otherwise, untap this card at the end of the mission. Use this ability only during a mission.
<i>They've had more than a thousand years to perfect the art of teaching war.</i>

card.name: Scarabus (SCB-9A)
card.property: ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) <i>Scarabus</i> deals +1 damage to a 'Mech that is the same speed or slower. If <i>Scarabus</i> is fully constructed when you reveal it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Sharilar Mori
Snake (SNK-1V)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Stealth (STH-1D)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Built to withstand more damage than most existing designs, the <i>Stealth</i> represents a new direction in scout 'Mechs.</i>

card.name: Strip Mining Operation
Sun-Tzu Liao
card.property: {T}: Take a Subterfuge card from the top of your Scrapheap and put it in your hand. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. • Chancellor of the Capellan Confederation

card.name: Tactical Advantage
card.property:
+3 initiative
Draw a card.

card.name: Taking the Hit
card.property: Redirect all damage dealt to one of your 'Mechs to another 'Mech you control.

card.name: Targeting Ace
card.property: Pilot You may add or subtract 1 from the die roll for each missile fired from 'Mech piloted by Targeting Ace. Use this ability immediately after rolling the die roll.

card.name: Tempest (TMP-3M)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Thunder (THR-1L)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +2 attack

card.name: Tracking System Failure
card.property:
Play Tracking System Failure only on a 'Mech. That 'Mech gets -2 attack, is now slow, and cannot block unless guarding.
<i>The way my weapons are failing to lock, you'd think I was fighting Morgan Kell!</i>

card.name: Transportation Delay
card.property:
Scrap Transportation Delay when it is revealed. You may activate Transportation Delay when opponent activates a 'Mech.
Deplete that 'Mech.

card.name: Underworld Connections
card.property:
{T}: Replace one counter on a card with two counters of the same type. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.
<i>Look, the Yakuza guarantees a hundred-percent return on resources, when my own people can't promise anything. That makes them patriots in <i>my </i>book.</i>

card.name: Unopposed
card.property: Play only when a 'Mech attacks alone and is not blocked. That 'Mech gets +X attack, where X is its base attack.

Vandervahn Chistu
card.property: {T}: Restock the top card of your Scrapheap. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. • saKhan

card.name: Venom (SDR-9K)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) If <i>Venom</i> is fully constructed when you reveal it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region. <i>To defend the Dragon, first defend yourself.''|Cockpit inscription on all '55 model ''Venoms</i>

card.property:
Overheat 5: +7 attack
'Mechs engaged in battle with <i>Widowmaker</i> get -1 attack.

Yen-Lo-Wang (CN9-YLW)

property.name: Allegiance
property.value: Unique - Inner Sphere - Davion - St. Ives

card.property:
